name: RUNES Magica
description:
RUNES Magica is 2D rogue-like magic action game.

Game feature


■ Rune system : You can create a new rune by combining and strengthening the rune.





■ Magic : Use your own rune as the form of magic you want.





■ Randomly generated map.

■ Various magic and artifacts

Story


The magicians of the Niaten Kingdom are falsely accused and chased by the Knights.
Lunia, a girl wizard who lived in hiding with her father, loses her father to the Knights and leaves for revenge.

Knights


The Knights will annihilate all wizards by order of the Knights King.
Defeat the chasing Knights and fulfill your revenge.

Bounty Hunters


The bounty hunters attack Lunia for bounty, honor, and their own reasons.
Eliminate all enemies in Lunia's way.
